title: Easy to make boiled fruit cake
ingredients: ['110g (4 oz) margarine', '225g (8 oz) mixed dried fruit', '170g (6 oz) brown sugar', '3 teaspoons mixed spice', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '225ml (8 fl oz) water', '2 tablespoons amaretto liqueur', '2 eggs, beaten', '225g (8 oz) self raising flour', '1 pinch salt']
